snippet: In Texas, a state dominated by Republicans, conservatives are pushing two constitutional amendments that would limit most statewide officeholders.
lead_paragraph: In Texas, a state dominated by Republicans, conservatives are pushing two constitutional amendments that would limit most statewide officeholders.

headline.seo: Texas Term Limit Proposals Revived, 20 Years Later
headline.main: Conservatives Revive Proposals for Term Limits
headline.print_headline: Conservatives Revive Proposals For Term Limits
